questions.question: What is Proc360?
questions.answer: Proc360 is your all-in-one solution for sourcing, procuring, and shipping goods from China to Nigeria. We handle everything from finding suppliers to managing customs clearance, making importing easier for your businesses.

questions.question: Is Proc360 free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, the Proc360 app itself is free. You'll pay only for the services you use, such as procurement, shipping, and consolidation fees.

questions.question: Who can use Proc360?
questions.answer: Proc360 is designed for small business owners and entrepreneurs. You don't need a business license to get started.

questions.question: Do I need a business license to use Proc360?
questions.answer: No, a business license is not required to use Proc360.

questions.question: Is Proc360 available on iPhone and Android?
questions.answer: Proc360 is currently a web app accessible on iPhone and Android phones.

questions.question: How do I sign up for a Proc360 account?
questions.answer: Visit the Proc360 website and click the signup link. Follow the on-screen instructions, enter your information, and verify your email address.

questions.question: Do I need a referral code to sign up?
questions.answer: No, you don't need a referral code to create a Proc360 account. However, if another user referred you, input the referral code in the related section.

questions.question: Can I use Proc360 to import items from other countries besides China?
questions.answer: Currently, Proc360's primary focus is on importing goods from China. However, we may explore expanding to other countries in the future.

questions.question: What are Proc360's business hours?
questions.answer: Proc360's business hours are from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM GMT +1.

questions.question: Can I leave a review for Proc360's services?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Proc360 appreciates your feedback. You can leave a review [Provide link to review platform].

questions.question: What payment methods does Proc360 accept?
questions.answer: Proc360 accepts local currencies (like Naira, Yuan, and Dollars) which are converted to CNY (Chinese Yuan) for in-app transactions.

questions.question: What currency are prices listed in?
questions.answer: All prices on Proc360 are listed in Chinese Yuan (CNY).

questions.question: How do I fund my Proc360 wallet?
questions.answer: You can fund your wallet using your preferred currency (Naira, Yuan, Dollars). The funds will be converted to CNY at the displayed exchange rate.

questions.question: In what currency are transactions made?
questions.answer: All transactions within the Proc360 app are conducted in Chinese Yuan (CNY).

questions.question: How do I update my payment information on Proc360?
questions.answer: Proc360 does not store your credit card information. To add funds to your Proc360 wallet, you can use direct bank transfers or PayStack.

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees associated with using Proc360?
questions.answer: No, Proc360 prioritizes transparency. All charges are clearly stated upfront, ensuring no hidden fees.

questions.question: Can I pay shipping fees using my wallet?
questions.answer: Yes, you can use your wallet balance to pay for shipping fees.

questions.question: How do I place a link order?
questions.answer: Navigate to your dashboard, click 'Create an Order,' then select 'Link Order.' Paste the product link, specify the quantity and any details (color, size), and submit your order.

questions.question: How long does it take for an order to be reviewed?
questions.answer: Link Order: Up to 8 hours during working hours. Picture Order: Up to 3 working days. Custom Order: Up to 5 working days (depending on the complexity of the order and whether you need to create custom designs or OEM).

questions.question: Can I cancel an order after I have placed it?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, orders cannot be canceled once payment is complete.

questions.question: Is there a minimum order value?
questions.answer: No, there is no minimum order value. However, there is a minimum service charge of 35 Chinese Yuan (CNY).

questions.question: Can I return or exchange an item?
questions.answer: Due to the complexities of international returns, Proc360 does not currently offer returns or exchanges. To ensure you receive exactly what you ordered, Proc360 emphasizes clear specifications before purchases are made.

questions.question: Can I place bulk orders through Proc360?
questions.answer: Proc360 is designed to handle a wide range of order sizes, including bulk orders. The consolidation feature allows you to combine multiple links or orders into a single shipment for convenience and potentially reduced costs.

questions.question: Does Proc360 offer discounts or promotions?
questions.answer: Yes, Proc360 frequently offers discounts and promotions. They also have a customer reward system that provides permanent discounts to users who reach certain spending milestones.

questions.question: How do I pay for my orders on the app?
questions.answer: All payments within the Proc360 app are made from your wallet. To fund your wallet, you can use either a direct bank transfer or PayStack.

questions.question: Can I pay my suppliers from the app?
questions.answer: No, suppliers cannot be paid directly from the app. Proc360 handles payments to suppliers on your behalf after you've placed your order.

questions.question: Is the amount on the invoice for both procurement and shipping?
questions.answer: The initial invoice for an order does not include shipping costs. It provides an estimated weight to help you calculate potential shipping fees. The final shipping fee is calculated after Proc360 receives and weighs the goods in their warehouse.

questions.question: How do I track my order?
questions.answer:
You can track your order within the Proc360 app:
  1. Go to the app and locate the shipping truck icon on the upper right corner of the dashboard.
  2. Click the icon to navigate to the tracking page.
  3. Enter your order ID to track a specific order.
  4. If you want to track a shipment (i.e., the progress of your international shipments), switch to the 'Track Shipment' page and enter a shipment ID.

questions.question: How do I navigate on the app?
questions.answer: The Proc360 app is designed for easy navigation. The main sections (Dashboard, Orders, Parcels, Wallet, Settings, Referrals) can be accessed through the hamburger menu (three horizontal lines) on the top left corner of the screen. Within each section, clear buttons and instructions will guide you through various actions and functions. If you have any trouble, you can consult our FAQ section or contact our support team for assistance.

questions.question: What is a parcel in Proc360?
questions.answer: A parcel is an individual package containing your purchased items from a supplier or an e-commerce app in China. You must have shared your unique Proc360 address with the supplier, and the supplier (or app) must have sent a parcel to your Proc360 address.

questions.question: How do I consolidate parcels?
questions.answer:
1. Locate the tracking IDs for each parcel you want to combine. You can find the tracking ID either from the app you purchased from or from the supplier you purchased from.
  2. Within the Proc360 app, go to the 'Parcels' section and click 'Add Parcels.'
  3. Enter each tracking ID in the designated field and click 'Add.'
  4. Repeat for all parcels you want to consolidate.
  5. Once finished, click 'Submit for Review.'

questions.question: Is there a limit to the number of parcels I can consolidate?
questions.answer: There is no limit to the number of parcels you can consolidate in a single order with Proc360.

questions.question: Can I add parcels to a consolidation order after I have submitted for review?
questions.answer: No, you can't. Once you have submitted a list of parcels for consolidation, you can no longer add parcels to that particular packing list. Additional parcels will be part of a new consolidation request.

questions.question: How long does it take to consolidate my parcels?
questions.answer: The consolidation process typically takes 2-4 working days, depending on the size and complexity of the order. Once your parcels are consolidated, you’ll receive a notification with the final weight and dimensions of your package, along with the updated shipping fees.

questions.question: What is a shipment in Proc360?
questions.answer: A shipment is a consolidated package containing the items from all your processed orders. After we have received your parcels and consolidated them into one or more shipments, we send them to you via the shipping method you have selected.

questions.question: How do I select a shipping method?
questions.answer: During checkout, you'll have the option to select a shipping method based on your preference and budget. The app will display available shipping options, along with their costs and estimated delivery times.

questions.question: How do I check the status of my shipment?
questions.answer:
You can track the status of your shipment:
  1. Log in to the Proc360 app.
  2. Locate the shipping truck icon on the upper right corner of the dashboard.
  3. Click the icon to navigate to the tracking page.
  4. Select 'Track Shipment' and enter your shipment ID.
  5. The app will display the latest status and location of your shipment.

questions.question: How long does it take to receive my shipment?
questions.answer: Delivery times depend on the shipping method selected and the destination. Air shipping usually takes 7-14 days, while sea shipping can take up to 45 days.

questions.question: What shipping methods are available?
questions.answer: Proc360 offers air freight and sea freight options. Air freight is faster but more expensive, while sea freight is more economical for larger shipments but takes longer.

questions.question: Are shipments insured?
questions.answer: Proc360 offers shipment insurance options during checkout. If you choose to insure your shipment, you’ll be covered in the event of loss or damage. Insurance is recommended for high-value shipments.

questions.question: How do I change my account information?
questions.answer: To update your account information, log in to Proc360, navigate to the 'Settings' page, and select the information you want to change. Be sure to save your changes.

questions.question: How do I delete my Proc360 account?
questions.answer: If you wish to delete your account, please contact our support team through the app, and they will assist you with the process. Note that deleting your account is irreversible, and all your data will be permanently removed.

questions.question: How does Proc360 handle my personal information?
questions.answer: Proc360 takes your privacy seriously and adheres to strict data protection policies. Your personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We do not sell your data to third parties.

questions.question: Does Proc360 share my data with third parties?
questions.answer: No, Proc360 does not sell or share your data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
